text: @FredTJoseph @Zelle @CashApp @PayPal Good morning. I pray that today I am seen. Please help my daughter and I. I am a single mom that was laid off from both jobs due to COVID19 struggling to come up with the rest of rent and put food on the table for my baby. Anything helps $manilee428 #RENTRELIEF
